      Constructors in io.github.izdwuut.yarl.model.systems with parameters of type World 
      Constructor Description
      MovementSystem​(World world)
      Specifies a class of Entities that are processed by the system, which is every Entity that can be moved (i.e. has PositionComponent that can be manipulated and MovementComponent that describes movement).
